title: First State National Historical Park: Old Swedes Church
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Old Swedes Church              Old Swedes Church         Old Swedes Church. NPS  In 1699, Swedish and Finnish settlers finished building what is now called the Old Swedes Church in Wilmington, Delaware, and just a short walk from Fort Christina. Much of the original church stands today and is celebrated as the oldest church in America still used for worship.The church has preserved records of life of early settlers and many are buried at the graveyard on site.  Visit Old Swedes Church website for more information.
